content.title: This is the first step to making your dream come true
content.text: We add innovation to your projects. Simply fill out the form and select from the list of services we provide. We will contact you to give you a personalized quote.

step3.title: When do you want to start your project?
step3.subtitle: Select the most suitable options.

step4.title: Fill in your details
step4.subtitle: This contact form corresponds to the normal procedure of sending an email directly to our mailbox. Your data is not stored or used for any other purpose.

step5.title: If necessary, describe in a few words what you want in your project

step6.title: Your quote request has been sent successfully.
step6.subtitle: This was the first step towards realizing his dream.
